name: International Conference on Future Trends in Electrical, Electronic Communication and Computing ICFEEC - 2022
content: International Conference on Future Trends in Electrical, Electronic Communication and Computing (ICFEEC 2022) is organised with a primary objective of bringing together scientists, researchers, academicians and industrial experts in the field of Electrical, Electronic Communication and Computing to a common forum. It aims to be one of the leading international conferences for presenting novel and future trends in the Electrical and Electronic Systems. The conference will mainly focus on recent advances in the fields of Communication, Computing, and Automation. Peer-reviewed accepted papers will be published in IRO Journals.
